actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: To amend the McCarran-Ferguson Act to limit the exemption with respect to the business of personal motor vehicle insurance, and for other purposes.
short_title: Motor Vehicle Insurance Consumer Protection Act of 1989

summary.text: Motor Vehicle Insurance Consumer Protection Act of 1989 - Amends the McCarran-Ferguson Act to limit the antitrust exemption with respect to the business of personal motor vehicle insurance. Provides that this Act shall not be construed to prohibit any State from establishing or approving a residual market mechanism to provide personal motor vehicle insurance.

titles.title: Motor Vehicle Insurance Consumer Protection Act of 1989
To amend the McCarran-Ferguson Act to limit the exemption with respect to the business of personal motor vehicle insurance, and for other purposes.
